# Task

Write a pig latin transformer called `pig_latinify` that operates on a vector of strings. It iterates over each string and changes it to pig latin. Each iteration should run on a separate thread.



# Data

pig_latinify(["hello", "apple", "strong", "world"])

```julia

using Threads
function pig_latinify(vec::AbstractVector{String})
    fin = [String]()
    for i in 1:length(vec)
        push!(fin, pig_latin(vec[i]))
    end
    fin
end

function pig_latin(str::String)
    vowels = Set(['a', 'e', 'i', 'o', 'u', 'A', 'E', 'I', 'O', 'U'])
    n = length(str)
    if isvowel(str[1])
        return str*"ay"
    elseif !isvowel(str[n])
        return String[str[2:n], str[1], "ay"]
    else
        i = findfirst(vowels, str)
        if i > 1
            return String[str[i+1:n], str[1:i], "ay"]
        else
            return str*"way"
        end
    end
end

function isvowel(c::Char)
    in(Set(['a', 'e', 'i', 'o', 'u', 'A', 'E', 'I', 'O', 'U']), c)
end

println(pig_latinify(["hello", "apple", "strong", "world"]))
```
